name: Goth Girlfriend
description:
A big tiddy Goth Girlfriend is alone and bored for the weekend. Do you have what it takes to seduce her?

Features

  • Choice based visual novel game.
  • Your choices matter and will affect the outcome
  • CG renders in 4K resolution
  • Incredibly detailed and uncensored sex and nudity
  • Visual novel features including a gallery mode
  • You can pet a dog
